title: Brookline agrees to pay $3 million to woman who accused teacher of sexually abusing her
author: Molly Farrar

title: 2 found dead in Lawrence after apparent murder-suicide, DA says
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Local News The 32-year-old man and 30-year-old woman were in a long-term dating relationship, the DA said.
By Molly Farrar January 4, 2026 | 6:50 PM Less than a minute to read ShareSend this article to your social connections.
A couple in the thirties was found dead in their Lawrence apartment Saturday evening after an apparent murder-suicide, officials said.
